list.name: The Narzissenkreuz Institute
list.desc: A Fontaine orphanage, built on the ruins of the ancient civilization.

list.name: The Narzissenkreuz Ordo
list.desc: The Narzissenkreuz Ordo is the secret society formed by Rene de Petrichor and Jakob Ingold to create Neohumans in order to survive against the destruction of the world as foretold by the world-formula. It was declared an illegal extremist group and a criminal organization by Fontainian law under Iudex Neuvillette.

list.name: Institute of Natural Philosophy
list.desc: Once a thriving research facility, this Institute now lies in ruin beneath the waters of Fontaine.

list.name: Fontaine Research Institute
list.desc: The Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering was founded by Alain Guillotin and is often shortened to simply the Fontaine Research Institute.

list.name: Oceanids
list.desc: Oceanids are intelligent Hydro lifeforms created by the previous Hydro Archon, Egeria, and are able to manipulate water at will. All the people of Fontaine were once Oceanids, whom Egeria had turned into humans to satisfy their wishes, going against the will of the Heavenly Principles.

list.name: Lochknights
list.desc: Lochknights are followers of the Mistress of Many Waters, Egeria, who swore to protect the Oceanids, find the Pure Grail, and shatter the shackles that confined Egeria to atone for the original sin.

list.name: Melusines
list.desc: Melusines are an all-female species born from the wounds of Elynas after he was injured from an explosion that took place within his petrified body. They once resided exclusively in Merusea Village, but after meeting the newly appointed Iudex Neuvillette, many can now be found on the surface of Fontaine as part of the Marechaussee Phantom.

list.name: Adepti
list.desc: Adepti are a group of immortal illuminated beasts of Liyue, who have protected people for millennia.

list.name: Yakshas
list.desc: A group of Adepti who were summoned by Rex Lapis to vanquish the demons.

list.name: Spina di Rosula
list.desc: Spina di Rosula is a citizen-oriented society that involves many walks of life and focuses its efforts on solving difficult issues amongst the common folk, and that it will cooperate with the Fontainian authorities where needed.

list.name: Marechaussee Phantom
list.desc: The personal unit of the Chief Justice Neuvillette, which is responsible for crime investigation. It is based in the Palais Mermonia and is one of the Maison Gardiennage's departments.

list.name: Fortress of Meropide
list.desc: Fontaine prison, run by the Duke Wriothesley.

list.name: Hexenzirkel
list.desc: A secret witch society, which discusses secrets at the tea parties and explores Irminsul. There are eight witches in the Hexenzirkel.

list.name: Children of Echoes
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Nanatzcayan. The tribe's people are famous for mining and live alongside the Tepetlisaurs.

list.name: Scions of the Canopy
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Huitztlan. The tribe's people love extreme sports like rock climbing, rappelling, and volcano parkour and live alongside the Yumkasaurs.

list.name: People of the Springs
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Meztli. They are cheerful, kind people, lovers of music, gatherings, and hot springs. The tribe lives alongside the Koholasaurs.

list.name: Masters of the Night-Wind
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Mictlan. They are famous for their predictions and rituals to amplify the ability to communicate with the Night Kingdom and the Wayob.

list.name: Flower-Feather Clan
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Tlalocan. The tribe's people live alongside the Qucusaurs.

list.name: Collective of Plenty
list.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Teteocan. The tribe's people live alongside the Tatankasaurs.

list.name: Aranara
list.desc: Greater Lord Rukkhadevata's familiars and spirits of the forest.

list.name: Sumeru Akademiya
list.desc: The Sumeru organization, which exercises administrative control over the region and educates people.

list.name: Jinn
list.desc: Familiars of the Goddess of Flowers, birthed from intoxicating dreams and the bitter memories of loss.

list.name: Pari
list.desc: The Dendro Archon's familiars. They were born from the pure Amrita and the divine bird, Simurgh.

list.name: Seelie
list.desc: Once a mighty race that lived to guide mankind. They have been cursed to degenerate into nothing but empty husks. They show those who follow them treasures hidden from human eyes.

list.name: Angels
list.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

list.name: Elemental Dragons
list.desc: An ancient race, who ruled Teyvat long before human existence. Dragons belong to the Light Realm.

list.name: Descenders
list.desc: Beings from outside of Teyvat, whose wills can rival an entire world.

list.name: Shades
list.desc: Four Shades created by the Primordial One.

list.name: Fatui
list.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

list.name: Knights of Favonius
list.desc: An order responsible for protecting Mondstadt and its belief of freedom. Despite its members are known as knights, none have been knighted by any royalty — knighthood is a title they earned from the noble duties they assume.

list.name: Four Winds
list.desc: The four guardians of Mondstadt, who were summoned a thousand years ago and answer to the Anemo Archon. The Four Winds include the Wolf of the North, the Falcon of the West, the Lion of the South, and the Dragon of the East.

list.name: Youkai
list.desc: A group of nearly extinct supernatural beings from Inazuma.

list.name: Adventurers' Guild
list.desc: An organization based in Snezhnaya that recruits adventurers and accepts and distributes commissions. They have a representative office in every major city. Their motto is "Ad astra abyssosque!"

list.name: Frostmoon Scions
list.desc: The descendants of the legendary golden realm, who worship the Frostmoon Goddess. They possess powers that are believed to predate the elements.

list.name: Moon Goddesses
list.desc: Aria, Sonnet, and Canon — three sisters and Moon Goddesses who once ruled the firmament. The war with the Second Throne led to the sisters' death.

list.name: Fae
list.desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Winter Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.
